mapper.insert: insert into reserve(reserve_num, reserve_person, reserve_date, reserve_pro, member_num, sch_num, event_code, court_code, event_date, event_time) values(reserve_incre.nextval, #{res_person}, SYSDATE, #{res_pro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{m_no}, #{sch_num}, #{event_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{court_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{event_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{event_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select sch_tel as sch_tel, sch_location as sch_location, sch_name as sch_name, event_name as event_name, TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as event_date, event_time as event_time, reserve_num as res_no from reserve natural left outer join school natural left outer join event where TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') > 0 and member_num = #{m_no}
select court_code as court_code, TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as event_date from reserve where reserve_num = #{res_no}
mapper.delete: delete from reserve where member_num = #{m_no} and reserve_num = #{res_no}
mapper.select: select sch_name as sch_name, event_name as event_name, TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as event_date, event_time as event_time, court_price as court_price from reserve natural left outer join school natural left outer join event natural left join court where 0 >= TO_CHAR(event_date, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') and member_num = #{m_no}

select member_nick as m_nick, event_name as event_name, TO_CHAR(event_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as event_date, event_time as event_time, reserve_person as res_person from reserve natural left outer join member natural left outer join court natural left outer join event where sch_num=(select mng_no from member where member_num = #{m_no}) order by event_date desc
